summary: Replaces the level up music with the beginning of the song \"The Bridge Of Khazad Dum\" from LOTR.
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the level up music with the beginning of the song \"The Bridge Of Khazad Dum\" from LOTR.


Music   http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NUIZvAe3RBg


INSTALLATION
============
1) Extract the .zip file
2) Copy the data folder
3) Navigate to your main Skyrim folder and paste it there. Merge with existing data folder.
author: Pier122
